name: Descent
description:
When the character to which this is attached is your active character, when you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die. After this effect is triggered, deal 1 Anemo DMG.
Usage(s): 1
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is your active character, when you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. After this effect is triggered, deal 1 $[K105].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>
